original_text: That morning I spoke to the people. In the evening of that day, my wife died. The next morning I did what the Lord had told me to do.
korean_text: 내가 아침에 백성에게 말하였더니 저녁에 내 아내가 죽었으므로 아침에 내가 받은 명령대로 행하매

sentences.original_text: That morning I spoke to the people.
In the evening of that day,
I did what the Lord had told me to do.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 주께서 내게 하라고 명하신 것을 행했습니다.
